body.p: BUSMASTER Can be connected to LIN physical channel using LIN Controller.
Currently BUSMASTER Supports the following LIN Controllers.

ol.li: ETAS BOA (To monitor messages associating LDF file is required for LIN ETAS BOA)

body.p: To select controller use LIN->Driver Selection->{Driver} For example to select ETAS ISOLAR EVE Driver use LIN->Driver Selection->ETAS ISOLAR-EVE.
Once the Controller is configured BUSMASTER Can be connected to LIN network using LIN->Connect Menu.
